title: HiSuite
answer:
Your phone provides HiSuite. 

 Connect your phone to a computer using a USB cable, and touch Device file manager (MTP), Connected as USB storage, or Charge only in the notification panel, to display a menu for USB connections. 

 ![](http://consumer.huawei.com/support/servlet/imageServlet?dlType=HtmlAreaImage&imageId=113104)![](http://consumer.huawei.com/support/servlet/imageServlet?dlType=HtmlAreaImage&imageId=113105) ![](http://consumer.huawei.com/support/servlet/imageServlet?dlType=HtmlAreaImage&imageId=113106)
